content:
jo Comerford

On Feb PERIOD  The New York Times published an expos on the practice of performing pelvic examinations on nonconsenting anesthetized patients PERIOD The article titled She Didnt Want a Pelvic Exam PERIOD She Received One Anyway details the story of both Weitz and nurse Janine who also received a pelvic exam despite explicitly telling her doctor she preferred that medical students were not present and never consented to the examination PERIOD Janine did not provide her last name PERIOD



Tagged Thea Burke Jo Comerford Lynn Morgan
